attributes.action: Re-classify the subsidised 'food essentials' to healthy raw ingredients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please remove the food subsidies from the current 'essentials' such as burgers, chips and pizza and place them on healthier foods such as raw fruit, vegetables, fish and meat; from white bread to brown bread, to make healthy eating more accessible to lower income households and encourage a change in eating habits for UK citizens.
